lines.text: Those candles on the floor... maybe they were used to block the spell?
Well, I don't know what it looks like when you cast it- maybe it's not something you can block.
But if it is, what happens if you shoot it at something that isn't flesh? The book doesn't say!
Maybe it glitches out and backfires?
That's a lot of what-ifs and maybes. Maybe you oughta focus on what the book does say.
